trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines the formatting options that customize string parsing for some date and time parsing methods.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

If no time zone is specified in the parsed string, the string is assumed to denote a local time.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx x xxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

If no time zone is specified in the parsed string, the string is assumed to denote a UTC.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx x XXX.

trans-unit.source:
\n

If the parsed string contains only the time and not the date, the parsing methods assume the Gregorian date with year = 1, month = 1, and day = 1.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxx xxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx $ 0$ xxxxx $ 0$ xxx xxx $ 0.

trans-unit.source:
If this value is not used, the current date is assumed.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x
